description:
[h1] The famous DVD screensaver [/h1]

This is the famous DVD screensaver.
[i]It will even go across multiple screens![/i]

With the recent additions you will also be able to upload your own images.

[hr][/hr]
[h2] Most recent updates [/h2]

[list]
[*] Added a disable button for the rainbow effect
[*] Added custom background colors
[*] Added custom file support
[*] Added size customization
[*] Added speed customization
[*] Added the wallpaper
[/list]

[hr][/hr]
[h2] Side notes [/h2]
At this moment the custom background only works when the rainbow effect is disabled. This is because the rainbow effect is making a mask over the image and uses that to track the movement.

The default color for the background is: #040404

[hr][/hr]
If you like this wallpaper, please:

[img]https://i.imgur.com/p7Fv1Z6.gif[/img]

[quote=Kermit]It's just something I made because it looked funny.[/quote]
title: Dvd Screensaver
